roleset.name: amend text with a partner
roleset.note: COEDIT-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on newswire, comparison to 'edit'. No VNcls. (from coedit.01-v)

example.name: both args
example.text: Mr. Kristol , an American Enterprise Institute fellow , co-edits The Public Interest and publishes The National Interest .
example.arg: Mr. Kristol , an American Enterprise Institute fellow ,
The Public Interest and publishes The National Interest
